titleStmt.title: King Charles his glory, and rebels shame. Collonel Hevvson. To a pleasant new tune: Or, The crost couple.

notesStmt.note: The words "Collonel Hevvson." are separated by the woodcut illustration.
Verse: "CHARLES the first was a Noble King ..."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
Cf. Wing K553 which gives title word "rebells".
